surface_getpixel: This function can be used to get the colour of a specific pixel from a surface, using the local coordinates of the surface where (0,0) is the top left corner. This function should not be used very often as it is extremely slow and may cause a pause in your game.

NOTE: When working with surfaces there is the possibility that they can cease to exist at any time due to them being stored in texture memory. You should ALWAYS check that a surface exists using surface_exists() before referencing them directly.
